nodes.text: Escape from the Monster Ship: A Droid Adventure

Escape from the Monster Ship: A Droid Adventure is a 1986 children's book written by Bonnie Bogart and illustrated by Amador. It adapts the Star Wars Droids episode entitled "Tail of the Roon Comets," which was written by Michael Reaves, based on a story by Ben Burtt.
